0f4465f8-2990-4141-98a1-090f9c4d0dd8.name: 70 points as dictated on page MH4 pg 8.

964e5276-6abe-4623-b3ec-c49e48704161.name: Combat Reflexes
964e5276-6abe-4623-b3ec-c49e48704161.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

cb62d87f-9ae8-4fc6-b376-8bddcc6ad370.name: Luck
cb62d87f-9ae8-4fc6-b376-8bddcc6ad370.notes: Usable once per hour of play

546e813b-22fb-4b34-aeae-123eaec4fb59.name: Signature Gear
546e813b-22fb-4b34-aeae-123eaec4fb59.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

003d0a9d-30d6-4062-8290-fd48ec789840.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
003d0a9d-30d6-4062-8290-fd48ec789840.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

b06035df-3171-4307-a675-02b6d32a5123.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
b06035df-3171-4307-a675-02b6d32a5123.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

150b49ad-4ca0-4929-8ae7-93d169841c08.name: Berserk
150b49ad-4ca0-4929-8ae7-93d169841c08.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you suffer damage over 1/4 your HP in the space of one second, and whenever you witness equivalent harm to a loved one

fc160eeb-a6f1-4181-9dbe-70688c858741.name: Charitable
fc160eeb-a6f1-4181-9dbe-70688c858741.notes: Make a self-control roll in any situation where you could render aid or are specifically asked for help, but should resist the urge

2d630792-9d67-4fdc-8de0-cf5edf7ae954.name: Gregarious
2d630792-9d67-4fdc-8de0-cf5edf7ae954.notes: -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

6cd45454-b3a7-4b56-acbb-7f6640aa86a7.name: Loner
6cd45454-b3a7-4b56-acbb-7f6640aa86a7.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

f319225e-b2f9-4ce4-b3e8-429d0c45b712.name: Curious
f319225e-b2f9-4ce4-b3e8-429d0c45b712.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

929cd8b4-a7a8-45b8-859d-8d801f3c4b8b.name: Impulsiveness
929cd8b4-a7a8-45b8-859d-8d801f3c4b8b.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

d0305c74-9e5e-4fbb-9033-6be477a0b3a1.name: Manic-Depressive
d0305c74-9e5e-4fbb-9033-6be477a0b3a1.notes: At the beginning of each play session, roll 1d. On 1-3, you are in your manic phase; 4-6 indicates depression. Every five hours of game time thereafter, roll 3d. A 10 or less indicates that you begin a mood swing. Over the next hour, you shift from your current phase to the opposite one. You remain in the new phase for at least five hours, after which you must again roll 3d.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident
toward any stranger and any “legitimate” reaction penalty (e.g., for an unfriendly race or nationality) is doubled

b32c957c-3831-4d13-8554-3efa0fdf12cd.name: Mild Shyness
b32c957c-3831-4d13-8554-3efa0fdf12cd.notes: You are uneasy with strangers, especially assertive or attractive ones.

3715cfcd-00de-4f2b-8551-a6122ce7ec4e.name: Severe Shyness
3715cfcd-00de-4f2b-8551-a6122ce7ec4e.notes: You are very uncomfortable around strangers, and tend to be quiet even among friends.

ec312993-dbea-4fa8-a4a0-c5961466fd48.name: Special Disadvantages
ec312993-dbea-4fa8-a4a0-c5961466fd48.notes: See Customization Notes in MH4 p9

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

b7d0bc4f-b2bf-478e-a1ad-2e83bc569a49.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
b7d0bc4f-b2bf-478e-a1ad-2e83bc569a49.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

4ecadefa-00ae-43ab-956c-205fd3b22e4e.name: 2 more points in Know Thy Enemy
